key.name: toggle-window-key
key.description: Toggle filtering for currently focused window.

key.name: toggle-screen-key
key.description: Toggle filtering for every window on the screen.

key.name: switch-filter-key
key.description: Select filter to use from filters list : either apply all filters or only one specific filter (triggering this action switches filters one by one and eventually comes back to the "all filters" mode).

key.name: filters
key.description: List of plain text filter files that should be applied when filtering windows or screen.

key.name: filter-decorations
key.description: Window decorations (borders and titlebar) will be filtered as well as window contents if enabled.

key.name: filter-match
key.description: Windows to be filtered by default. (match)
